name: Log 141
description: Can you solve the mystery of Log 141? Step into this vast image-less landscape where the words you type are your input for the game. Log 141 is an indie game originally developed as a high school computer science project. Inspired by text-based games of the past, this game was created to be played entirely within a terminal window. Traverse a text-based adventure filled with puzzles and mystery as you uncover the secret of Log 141.
